results:
Based on the search results, I can confirm the following information about George Orwell's "1984" (also titled "Nineteen Eighty-Four"):

## Publication Details:

**Publication Date**: The novel was published on 8 June 1949 by Secker & Warburg in London, United Kingdom.

The UK edition is the true first edition, published on June 8, 1949; the first US edition followed only five days later.(no content)It was Orwell's ninth and final completed book.

## Publisher and First Edition Information:

Published by Secker & Warburg, London, 1949(no content)First Edition, First Printing with the words "First Published 1949" printed on the copyright page.

## Additional Details:

The iconic dust jacket designed by Michael Kennard for the genuine first edition of the novel published by Secker & Warburg on the 8th June featured both "Nineteen Eighty-Four" and "1984" on it.(no content)The UK edition was published with both red and green dust jackets (no priority established); the US in both red and blue (no priority).(no content)The UK edition first printing ran 26,575 copies, the US edition approximately 20,000.(no content)The book was an instant best seller in both Great Britain and the United States.

The search confirms that George Orwell's "1984" was indeed first published on June 8, 1949, by Secker & Warburg in London, making it the true first edition of this dystopian masterpiece.
